title: A Little Less Conversation
lyrics:
[intro] (E) (A) (E) (A) [stop] [riff]
 
A (E7)little less conver(A7)sation,
A little more (E7)action please (A7)
(E7)All this aggra(A7)vation
Ain’t satis(E7)factioning me (A7)
A (E)little more bite and a (G)little less bark
A (A)little less fight and a (D)little more spark
Close your (E)mouth and open up your (B)heart and baby
Satis(E7)fy me (A7)
Satis(E7)fy me baby (A7)
 
(E7)Baby close your eyes and (A7)listen to the music
(E7)Dig through the summer (A7)breeze
(E7)It’s a groovy night and I can (A7)show you how to use it
(E7)Come along with me and put your (A7)mind at ease
 
A (E7)little less conver(A7)sation,
A little more (E7)action please (A7)
(E7)All this aggra(A7)vation
Ain’t satis(E7)factioning me (A7)
A (E)little more bite and a (G)little less bark
A (A)little less fight and a (D)little more spark
Close your (E)mouth and open up your (B)heart and baby
Satis(E7)fy me (A7)
Satis(E7)fy me baby (A7)
 
(E)Come on baby I’m tired of talking (kazoo riff)
(E)Grab your coat and let’s start walking (kazoo riff)
(E)Come on, come on (Come on, come on!)
(G)Come on, come on (Come on, come on!)
(A)Come on, come on (Come on, come on!)
(B)Don't procrastinate, don't articulate
Girl it's getting late, getting’ upset waitin’ a(B7)round
 
A (E7)little less conver(A7)sation,
A little more (E7)action please (A7)
(E7)All this aggra(A7)vation
Ain’t satis(E7)factioning me (A7)
A (E)little more bite and a (G)little less bark
A (A)little less fight and a (D)little more spark
Close your (E)mouth and open up your (B)heart and baby
Satis(E7)fy me (A7)
Satis(E7)fy me baby (A7)
Satis(E7)fy me baby (A7)
Satis(E7)fy me baby (A7)
(E7-single strum) [end]
